Hi,
If add .seeds file to action directory, heritrix gives a warning: "thre=
ad-10 com.noelios.restlet.http.HttpServerConverter.commit() A response with=
 an unavailable entity was returned. Ignoring the entity for resource "http=
s://localhost:8443/engine/job/test2/report/SeedsReport.". Then, the seedsRe=
port shows "0 notcrawled http://address.com". All the seeds in crawler-bean=
.cxml has been download, which indicates the engine and config is OK. But t=
he seeds added through action directory are uncrawled. What is the problem?=


The .seeds file contains a single line "http://address.com/". Is it the r=
ight format? 

Thanks very much.
